case.state: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
What... just... happened? God, my head hurts like a motherfucker.
What... the hell? My head is killing me here... What just happened?
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
Is that... no, no, no, dear god, no! For the love of all that is good, not another one, not here!
What...? Where am I? How did I get here? And did that chick just say she's a fucking zombie!?
What...? Where am I? How did I get here? Hello?
H-huh? Hello? Where the hell am I?
I guess I'll take ~cards.text~.
Shoot me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, dealer. Don't actually shoot me, though.
I'll be needing ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, if you've got 'em.
~Cards.text~. I'll have ~cards.text~.
I can vibe with this.
Jackpot, baby.
Who's got two thumbs, a bounty on his head, several unhealthy coping mechanisms and a really good hand? Deimos. That's who!
Check 'em, bro!
Wouldn't get luck like this back in Nevada.
Checkmate.
And Sanford says I suck at poker. Psh.
Hell yeah! Now we're cooking with propane!
About freakin' time!
Jackpot!
Would ya look at that? Didn't even have to cheat for this.
This is totally where my luck does a 180. Just you watch.
Straight 10's from the judges! No, wait, there's a 9.8, but that's very respectable!
Another win coming my way!
Time to bring it right back.
Man, I'm getting nothing but static on most comms channels. Guess that shows we're not in Nevada anymore.
Y'see, I'm not that bad at card games after all.
I could never play poker with Hank, my associate. He doesn't even try to win, he just wants to flip the table.
Go fuckin' fish.
It's a hand. What else could I say about it?
Huh? What was that...? I thought I heard something.
Y'know what's great about strip poker? Zero stress. Nobody's going to bust my kneecaps for not showing my dick. Hopefully.
This part sucks. The boring part. The part where I've run out of things to say. That part.
For having reached the climax of the game, I'm not all that overwhelmed. Maybe a little whelmed.
I could really go for a soda right now. But every machine I use always gets stuck.
Good hands, bad hands. Just be glad to have yours attached.
My employers just told me to play better. I have... no idea how they saw my hand.
Ha, ha, very funny. Deimos's shitty luck strikes again.
Aw, really? I thought I did a good move there.
...Oh yeah. That's not what a flush is at all. Oops.
No matter what, keep a cool head, or you'll lose it. Someone said that, at some point, probably.
Well, now I feel like a smoothbrain.
If I didn't know it'd get me killed, I'd go for a smoke right now.
I'm not worried about losing, I'm just annoyed at not winning all the time.
Oh. Isn't that just great?
Wait, hold up, if I had kept the three... and gone with that instead... crap.
You ever just go braindead for a moment?
Note to self: stop playing like shit.
Dude, what the fuck?
I was going to slip the dealer a fiver, but, uh. I don't have a fiver.
If the stakes were a bit higher, I'd be freaking out.
Yeah, I get it, stop telling me to play better. It's a fucking card game!
Well, shit. I guess I'm playing poker now. And y'know what? I'm cool with that.
Hey, don't take it the wrong way, Blue. It's actually pretty nice havin' someone worry about me for once, so, y'know. Thanks.
Hot damn, look at this chick, stripping on her own! Not really in the spirit of the game, but I'm not complaining!
Fuck me, whoever designed that suit knew exactly what they were doing, Blue. And I'm... definitely a fan.
OH DEAR GOD, NO! I KNEW IT! I FUCKING KNEW IT! And I didn't bring a goddamn gun, either!
OH DEAR GOD, NO! I KNEW IT! I FUCKING KNEW IT! ~Gunman~, quick! Shoot it!
...What's up with that ring, anyway? You married?
That ring's... a gun, or something? Seems kinda small.
Goddamn! For a nerd, you've got an awesome ass, Yuri!
The world's a dark place, Pyrrha. If we can't get some humor out of that darkness, what's the point?
I guess friendship is... Comradery? Being there when you need to be, through thick and thin. Something like that.
I have... no clue. I kind of just appeared here. I figure I should just roll with it.
Hell yeah I do! And I'm gonna be, once we save Nevada!
Man, joining the Space Force with a bunch of smoking hot babes sounds like a dream come true... But my employers aren't people I'd want to cross.
I... don't really read, babe. Ain't got time. Plus, all we get in Nevada are the same three shitty magazines.
I'm more of a leg man than an ass man, but damn. That's one hell of an ass.
I have no idea what you're on about, but uh. Is there a deck that's just a bunch of hot muscular babes, or something?
Were those... words, or did you just have a stroke, Jimmy?
Techno, baby! Nothing like some sick, electronic beats to get your blood pumping.
There's... a lot, and, like. Every guy's into something else. I'm... kind of a leg man. So you've got me already, blondie.
Well, no offense, but I'd probably kill you, marry ~player~ and fuck the rest.
Yeah, guess you could say I've killed about a few... hundred. Two hundred or so, last I checked.
...Now that you've brought it up, I don't think I've ever seen a kid, either. That's weird to think about.
...Oh. Game on. Sorry, ~player~. A man's gotta do what a man's gotta do, and I gotta kick your ass at cards, now.
Eh. Sanford's my only real fiend. We're close, sure, and I'd trust him with my life. But he's all I got.
Well, I can disassemble and reassemble a rifle in total darkness. I'm not saying I'd enjoy doing it, but I can.

There's an organization in control of the entire state after my ass, and my employers don't care if I live or die... and I feel like I'm forgetting something major, too. Like, a big mistake. Gotta remember what...
Oh, really? Do tell, what would I be into, exactly?
You're not smoking right now, so, no. But if you were, the ceiling would fall on you, or the floor would collapse, or the building blow up, or a chain... uh, y'know. Stuff like that.
I did smoke, and I've quit after I- GAH! Shit, that's new. My head started hurting when I tried to remember that.
Sci-Fi porn? I mean, sure, I'll take a look, but I had no idea shit like that even existed.
Hah! Fair enough, lady. Lying's fine with me, either way.
Does it, now? I might have to adjust my schedule, then---but just FYI, I got plenty of stamina to go around.
Actually, it's mostly hot dogs and beer. I have no idea what meat the hot dogs are, and I frankly don't want to know.

You bet!
Probably. I mean, I don't get to see `home' all that often. And `home' might have blown up. Slightly.
Oh? Well, I guess I'll just have to try and keep up, huh?

Well, it ain't a pressing matter, but I'd be totally down!
To mate!
With you!
...If you're implying something casual, sure. But `committing' is a different story. Being a mercenary's a bit too risky for that.
Probably off. I'm more used to the dark, and I see in it pretty well.
Bad. Real bad. Smoking kills, lady!
Most of my life has been a series of stupid mistakes, so it's not like I can judge.
I don't think I have a family. My associates are kind of the closest I have.
I come from a place populated entirely by dudes, Jessie. I hope that answers your question.
We don't really get any good porn in Nevada---not that I'd have time to watch it.
Ain't like I've ever committed. Or had the chance to `sleep around'. Nevada is just full of grunts, and I'm not fucking them.
I'm not sure on favorite, but... I kind of want to, uh. Try that `mating press' thing.
Honestly, I'd prefer it, long as I got to do the same. Work can get all kinds of busy.
There ain't much to spend on back in Nevada except food, drinks and guns. So, probably just stock up on the best gear I could get my hands on.
Nah. I'm pretty open about my shitty past.

As many as you're offering!
...Or, you know. a couple.
As long as the lie doesn't get me, or you, killed, it's no big deal.
I kind of don't do it that often in general. Maybe crank one out between missions, or something.
What...? I'm just seeing things, right? Right?!
F-fuck! I'm feeling off, like that... time at the compound...
How the fuck can you tell? Like... ya ain't totally wrong.
Kind of? You got that sort of `familiar, loser homegirl' kind of hotness.
...Yeah? I'm a mercenary. I'm kind of meant to do that, Tomoko.
I don't think I've ever been to a school before. Huh.
What kind of joint is this? It's full of kids, man.
Students...? Weird. There aren't even any schools in Nevada.
You chicks are from a... `literature' club? Kind of dorky. I don't even read.
Just us guys, huh? Guess it's just like back in Nevada, then.
Yo, hold up, I'm the only guy here!? Hell yeah!
Ooooh, nice! Only guy in the club, but don't worry---there's plenty of Deimos to go around, ladies!
I don't remember the last time I got to relax like this, honestly. Sometimes it just feels like I'm going from one fight to the next.
Man, I wonder if my mate Sanford would be down to play something like this. He's basically half-naked most of the time anyway.
I'm just real glad Hank ain't here. Knowing him, he'd strip his mask off first just to fuck with us.
So, you guys come here often? And live? Get-togethers in Nevada usually end pretty violently.
Hngh... Sh-shit, my bad, had a weird moment there. I'm good.
Anyone else hungry? I'm not supposed to, but I can totally tab my comms over to a Papa John's.
This alleyway seems kind of familiar, but not. More colorful than any of the ones in Nevada.
This seems like a bad place to relax, honestly. So many places where grunts could jump us from...
I'll be honest, I've never been to the beach before. Kinda dig it.
Man, I had almost totally forgotten what the sun feels like. Turns out it's warm!
This reminds me of a lot of my missions. Insert on the roof, take out whoever's on top, infiltrate the building. Hope I didn't just jinx it.
It's in the middle of the US, and the threat is... kind of reality itself. It's pretty wild.
Yep. My mate Sanford's always got my back, no matter what. And I've got his, in every mission.
All the time! Last mission I went on with Sanford, I took an ATP engineer's mask and pretended to be one. He smacked me over the head for it, but it sure lightened the mood.
Okay, now, for starters---I have no clue how or why I'm here.
Indeed I am. And a damn good one, if I do say so myself, big guy.
No shit? Small world. Good on her for getting out, then. The state's kind of a shithole.
Uh, yeah. Fresh as a cucumber. And don't worry about it, the head wound's old...ish.
Sure, I guess. Long as the recoil doesn't break your little wrists, Tomoko.
Last time I saw the sun...? Probably right before the whole improbability drive mess started.
I'm... fine, I think? A bit dazed, I guess, but alright otherwise.
Not usually alone, actually. And, well. I come from Nevada. Beautiful state, if you're a psychopath.
News reporter? I wish I had a job as cushy as that. I'm a mercenary, lady.
News reporter? Uh, no. Trench coats are just pretty standard around Nevada---it's that or smocks, usually.
Hank is... a psycho. And a merc, like me. I was picked up by his employers after I ditched the A.A.H.W.
Damn straight I do, babe! It's... it's kind of in the job description.
Yeah, Nevada's been a shithole as long as I remember. Hell, I was `born' because it's a shithole.
I would be, Jimmy, but I'm still tied to my current employers. If I crossed them, I'd be toast.
...No? The bandages are just from old wounds, and the skin... well, it's just skin. I think I'd know if I'd have died.
Strip poker? I don't really mind, I'm just... even more confused now is all.
Not like I was expecting to go without a loss today.
Yeah, I lost. Whooptie-doo.
Oh, no. I need to strip again. Just look at me, I'm practically quivering in my boots at the thought.
Y'see, I don't mind taking a few Ls. I'm just giving you all a false sense of security. It's strategy. Look it up, sweetie.
Yeah, I just about expected that. Eh whatever. Coat's going next.
Saw that coming like a speeding train. I'm taking off the coat.
Damn. You guys are pretty good at this, y'know that?
Maybe I should start asking you guys for pointers, since y'all are so good.
Shit. Guess it can't be helped---I gotta ditch the visor.
Aw, for real? We can't pretend I took something off, just this once?
I can tell I've got someone excited.
Eager to see the goods on full display, huh?
Well, then. This is starting to cut a bit close.
Yeah, alright, maybe I'm getting the slightest bit nervous now.
Aw, man. No do-overs, huh? No, I guess you don't get those here.
Fuck. We're doing this, huh? For real?
And it ain't like going out would do me much good. Not since that time Hank killed the sun.
Though, I still don't really know how I got here. But, hey. Not the worst thing to suddenly find myself doing for no apparent reason.
No clue what that second word means, but it's all the killing and running about that keeps me in shape. Plus, y'know. Ain't about size, so on and so forth.
I think it's pretty much always been like that, actually. It got a lot worse when that whole Improbability Drive shit went down, though.
It's always been kind of bad. The A.A.H.W. has been going at for years.
A dozen years... might be right. Time's been all kinds of fucked up, too, so I can't really tell. It's been a good while, either way.
Yeah, don't know what that is. And I haven't lost that much blood. I think.
Well, they didn't care whether I lived or died, for a start. Then again, neither do my current employers. But the A.A.H.W. were bigger dicks in the grand scheme of things.

A mercenary is kind of like a doctor in reverse, when I think about it.
Uh. I kill people, lady.
Folks in Nevada wear trench coats 'cause they can't afford anything better, like kevlar vests. I wear it for style, though.
Well, y'know. If killing about 200 people on the job counts, then I'm a bit of a pro.
It's cool. Come to think of it, I do know a guy who died a couple of times--and got a new set of bandages each time.
I stick to guns, mostly. Assault rifles, machine guns, SMGs... On missions, I usually just grab whatever's available.
Y'know, I feel like this satchel could be useful, but all I ever put in it is like... one tablet.
It's not like I use this satchel much. There are so many weapons just lying around in Nevada, I never have to bring my own.
Fingerless gloves are all the rage in Nevada. I guess they even make common mooks feel cool.
Fingerless gloves are pretty standard for a merc. Plus, they look cool.
Listen, I know the coat's edgy. But trust me when I say it's got nothing on Hank's ensemble.
Yeah, yeah, edgy merc twink in his black leather trench coat. I bet you can hear `Pumped Up Kicks' in your head already.
Frankly, the boots might be the only practical part of my whole ensemble. They're good for going through all the sand and rocks in Nevada.
The boots are pretty useful---they have a good grip on them for running and climbing and whatever else.
This visor is probably the most iconic part of my look, y'know. The story of how I wound up with it is pretty wild.
I remember when I got this visor like it was yesterday... maybe it was, actually.
Well, ain't gonna keep you guys waiting, now. Feast your eyes on this!
Not gonna fuck around anymore, then---here's the full gunshow, coming up!
Well, whatever. At least I have the luxury of getting to wear pants.
Hey, maybe I should count myself lucky just for getting to wear pants. Don't ask.
Oh, man. Not a lot of folks out there who've seen, uh. This much of me.
Their only goal is to kill Hank, and anyone associated with him. They want me extra dead for betraying them, too.
I... don't really get it myself. It's some weird device thing that keeps Nevada the hellhole it is. The Sheriff launched it when Hank was after him.
Nah, if I'm missing any blood, it'll come back. Nothing to worry about there.
Last I recall, ATP engineers. We dealt with them pretty handily... but something does seem off about it.
I'm fine, girl. I'll get my bearings, probably---like I said, I got the head trauma a good while back. It'd be weird if it acted up now.
Nevada's a cold, dark place, Jimmy. But you get used to it. Either that, or you die.
If I gotta get down and dirty at close range, I prefer using Mr. Right and Mr. Left, if you catch my drift.
I'm more of a ranged guy, usually, but my mate Sanford uses a fuckin' meat hook on a metal wire. He does some crazy shit with it.
The only guy I know that's crazy enough to pick a chainsaw over a gun is Hank. And honestly, he'd do it one hundred percent of the time.
My employers keep track of my kills and give me a live report. Don't ask how they know---they just kind of do.
Pretty sure he's done it so much, he's used to it. He's died on more missions than he hasn't.
So, ain't like it's a big loss. Feels kind of good to have it off my shoulders.
Just be thankful you're facing me, and not Hank or something. He'd be stripping belts for the next nine rounds.
Eh. Ain't like I need to try to look dope, anyways, right?
But, y'know what? Fuck the gloves! I look like a grade-A badass with or without 'em, don't I?
It's actually a lot easier to move around like this. Not sure why I don't do it more often.
That trench coat is actually pretty hard to move around in sometimes. But it looks cool.
They're also pretty standard in Nevada. Literally everyone wears them.
I don't think I've seen any other footwear in Nevada, actually. Ever. Most be some kind of monopoly thing.
Sanford and I got wounded when a building landed on us. Wanted to cover up the bandages, and we found some clothes in the middle of a fight. It was kind of fun to try them all on.
All the running, dodging, fighting and getting the shit beaten out of you really pays off, sometimes!
Being a merc constantly fearing for your life has its perks!
At least I've got boxers. I know some people who don't.
Yeah, uh. Enjoy the legs. I guess.
Well, here's me. With my dick out. Enjoy.
...Well, uh, here I am. Cool.
Alright, now, that's... gonna feel weird. One of my associates is named Hank, and he's... different.
Yeah. You're me. Hilarious.
Hah! Get good, scrub! We won't miss ya!
Damn, dude, you're built like a brick shithouse! Bigger than my mate Sanford, even!
What's with the cat suit, bro? Are you, like... a furry?
You're one of those artsy types, right? Can't say I'm big on art.
You... fight with that hat on? And you haven't died yet?
Lose a round, take something off. Solid set of rules, there.
Hell yeah! The cards were on my side! As they should be!
Dudes. Chicks. As long as you're naked.
I guess I'm more used to seeing guys get naked. I'd say `don't take that out of context', but I already did.
Hey, man, if you're gonna lose to anyone, I've got a pretty good track record in these games.
Hm? What was that...? Sorry, didn't hear you.
Time to strip, chief.
Nice! Long as it ain't me!
Better make it count, bro.
Getting naked is part of the fun, right? And I bet it'll be more fun for you than me.
Don't stall, now. Never let yourself slow down/
Listen, dude, I'll work with whatever you give me here.
Hey, man, don t feel... t-too bad about the loss. Just look at me! Or, don't.
Make... it a show, dude!
Still got something to lose? Why don't you fix that, bud?
I'd appreciate it if you could just get naked. Y'know, as a bro?
I'll just say, if you take off something small, you're a bitch.
What? Hello? I swear I heard something just now...
Man, I kind of sucked this game, huh?
Jeez, we're still going, huh?
I might go grab a soda or something. anyone want anything?
Is it really a loss if you're still in the game?
Well, hot damn, we don't get girls like you in Nevada. Or girls in general. Or blondes.
You don't see a lot of men where you're from? Well, ain't that convenient---I don't get any chicks back in Nevada. Ever.
You're... a bit older, aren't you, lady? That's cool. People rarely live past 30 in Nevada. If ever.
Kind of wild to see someone as old as you, lady. Nobody like that in Nevada, y'know.
Wait... Where.... Where the fuck are your hands!?
You're some kind of... religious figure, right? I don't really know much about religious shit.
Hey, so, uh... that whole zombie thing was a joke, right? You're not planning on ripping off my face and eating it like jerky?
...Alright, now, I might have overreacted, but I haven't had a great time with zombies, to be fair. Also shouldn't you be green?
Gotta say, babe, that's one helluva sword. Don't just look like steel or carbon.
Jason, was it? Y'know, for all the psychotic murderers I meet, a hot one is a nice change of pace.
Tall, blonde and gorgeous. I don't see a lot of girls, but I know how I like 'em.
`Vengeful spirit'? Vengeful against what, your clothes?
Huh. You're a singer? Come to think it, all the music I've heard in Nevada is all instrumental. No vocals. Ever.
So, for a start... what do chicks like you do for fun?
Man, that armor looks expensive. You must be loaded, huh?
Ya don't really strike me as the type to go out and play card games with strangers, Jason. There a reason you're here?
Y'know, you'd probably get along really well with Hank. The guy likes killing and fighting more than he likes living.
Yo, Laev, is your hair that color naturally? Ain't ever seen hair like that before.
Fuck me, you're small! Sorry, it's just nice seeing someone who's as much of a midget as I am.
Well, you're a bundle of joy. You honestly never see that where I'm from.
Y'know, you've got the whole schoolgirl thing going for you, but ya seem super mature. I dig that.
So, you re an ex-con, huh? What's your kill count?
You're... eating in the middle of a game of strip poker? That's kind of weirdchamp.
Quiet type, huh? Ain't like people talk much where I'm from.
Y'know, for a chick, you'd totaly fit in back home. You just got th right sort of glum palette about you.
Damn. You're tall. I kind of have a thing for tall chicks.
Y'know, being on the shorter side has its perks, sometimes.
Guess you're all out of options now, huh?
And that'll be that! Full frontal time!
I'd ask you `what will it be', but we already know, don't we?

Want me to guess what you'll ditch next? I'm a bit of a psychic!
No, wait... The word is `psycho' .
Time to take your clothes off, lady. God, I love this game.
Another win for the D-Man! Remind me never to call myself `the D-Man' again!
Hey, don't get all flustered or something. It's only a game. For now.
Worried about undressing in front of a stunningly handsome, rugged mercenary? I get that.
How creepy would it be if I said I wish I had a camera? Because I wish I had a camera.
And now comes the part of the game that we actually enjoy!
Let's see that bod, girl.
Y'know how often we get babes like you in Nevada? 0 often. I mean, uh, never.
I just win, win, win, no matter what!
Come on, ya gotta be trying to impress me just a bit by now, right? Let's see what you got.
I'm waiting on a bit more skin, babe. I'm already showing it all.
I mean, hey. I'm naked, and you can get naked too. We could make it a party.
Y'know what's hella fun? Being naked. You should give it a shot.
If you still have stuff to lose, go ahead and lose it quick, babe.
What's it going to be? You've already got me excited.
Hey. ~Name~. You. Me. Card games. Getting naked. Let's go.
Oh, nice! Call me a dog, but I was hoping you'd lose.
I might've lost, but y'know. Have I really?
We're all winners here! At least I am!
I'm always down for a few more rounds, if you catch my drift.
This game gets even better when i don't have to worry about my cards.
Nice! Make me sweat, girl!
Aw, fuck yes! Just who I was hoping for!
Hell yeah! Bring it, babe!
You're up! And so am I, if ya know what I'm hinting at!
P-please, babe. I need this!
Damn. That's crazy.
A lot of dudes back home really don't wear much. If anything. This is almost a nice change.
Is having that junk on you comfortable? I feel like it wouldn't be.
I guess it can't be helped. Clothes are clothes.
I did spend about five layers taking off a bunch of bullshit, so I can't really complain.
Still got that, huh? Now I'm starting to feel like a dick for stalling the game this long.
Everyone's got something, I guess.
Oh, yeah. ~Clothing~. Makes sense, or whatever.
...What the fuck, dude?
You re really gonna do me dirty like that?
Kick a man while he's down, why don'tcha?
...Dick.
...You're a real motherfucker, y'know that?
Well, isn't someone a fucking coward?
I can tolerate a lot. This shit? Crosses the line.
Right, then. Maybe I should just go lay down.
Why am I still here?
I get it. I suck. Stop rubbing it in.
Life goes on, and so does this dumb game.
I guess we might as well just be warming up, still. I get it.
Not horny enough for the big stuff yet, are we? Fair play.
On to the next round, champ!
You can always do better. Usually, that is. Usually, always.

state.text: But, hey! More where that came from, right?

case.state: Guess I'll need to beat you over and over, and over again, then.
Die.
What a fucking joke.
Fucking brag about it, jackass.
Why the fuck do you even come here to pull shit like that?
You just lost a lot of respect from me, dude. Like, a lot.
I'd expect more from a grunt. Then again, grunts don't actually wear much.
Yo, command? I'd like to report a bruh moment.
I wonder what Hank's up to. Probably `his elbows in blood'.
I could risk having a smoke right now. Maybe it'd take us all out, if I'm lucky.
Not like we're in a hurry. Take it nice and easy, babe!
Keep it small, I don't mind.
Was I hoping for more? Sure, but it's cool. We got all the time in... Well, we got time.
Uh, yeah. That's cool, if that's what you wanna go for.
A little something is still something.
A bit disappointed here, babe. Y'know. Just a bit.
...Still going for that, huh? Hm.
Aw, man. I was kind of hoping my tits would make you more daring, y'know.
And that's it? That's all you're going to ditch?
Well, that's a little bit shit.
Is this a joke or a test?
Is this even teasing anymore? Blue-balling? Torture?
Do you like to cause suffering, girl?
I... have been betrayed!
Still? Then why the FUCK am I naked?
Am I really that gross?!
This really is purgatory!
Man, I suck.
I'm not even mad. I got stomped this game.
Anyone else get kind of tired after a wank?
It's a start---but only if you keep going.
Shame, though. That shit looked cute as fuck on you.
I dig chicks with a sense of style.
Let's keep the ball rolling.
I'd be a hypocrite if I started complaining, I guess. I had way too mach junk on me, too.

state.text: Maaaan, and I was getting all excited for you to strip. Lame.

case.state: I'll just... keep hoping for more, I guess.
Guess I'll have to be more convincing, moving forward.
Welp. Back to the spank bank of the mind I go.
Could I get something to work with next time? Pretty please?
If I squint... I can pretend something sexy is happening.
But consider---you get naked, too. Doesn't that sound fun as hell?
Gah! Shit, why am I even here, then?
...Sorry. Maybe I should just leave.
Forget it. I might as well quit.
I'm bringing more belts with me next game. Each one's a separate layer.
I guess someone like Sanford would've lost even quicker. He wears like... four things.
I mean, it was just the cards messing me up, right? I'm not actually braindead, am I?
Nice! Ain't much, but it's honest work.

Progress. Rearrange the letters, you get poggers.
Uh, actually, forget I said that.
Where'd you get the ~clothing~? The dork store?
Always a fan of not losing!
